name: unmeant
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not intended: He forthrightly claimed that any implication that he disagreed was unmeant. She was absolutely devastated that the unmeant slight had upset her friends so much.
More examplesFewer examplesThe unmeant gesture is a concept in sociology to describe an accident that conveys an inappropriate impression at the time it happens.For their conclusions to be considered valid, the researchers need to eliminate any unmeant variations in the testing conditions.Any suggestion that the result of the election was somehow invalid was completely unmeant.
